page.title: 05TRADE
page.content: The only shop is a small{general store and{sub-post office. }There is a wide range of groceries together with a stock of clothes and toiletries. Papers can be ordered and there is a selection of toys and gifts, many of which carry the "Arbuthnott" name for the souvenir hunters. The P.O. side sells stamps and T.V. licences, dispenses pensions and allowances and carries out the other functions of a sub-P.O. Mail is collected twice daily and there is a public call-box which is used as much by "passing trade" as the local population. Due to the friendly manner of the present proprietress, the shop serves a{social function,}encouraging customers to pass time and exchange news. As a rural community this is essential to our well-being.
